players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie is mafia. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Charlie with me."
You: "Bob, if you’re detective, why would mafia kill Diana instead of you? Charlie, claim your role. Bob, give details: why Charlie N1 and what result wording did you get?"

Charlie: "Bob is fake-claiming. Mafia killed Diana to frame me and keep a counterwagon alive. Alice, here are details: I’m vanilla town. Bob, what exact PM wording did you get, and why choose me over Diana N1?"

Charlie: "Bob’s story doesn’t add up: if he’s real, mafia obviously shoot the outed cop N1. Instead Diana dies. Alice, that’s TMI leakage. Force Bob to quote the exact result text and order of night results."

Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. Result text: 'You investigated Charlie. Result: MAFIOSO.' I picked him N1 for scummy pregame vibes. Mafia killed Diana to avoid confirming me by shooting; they want doubt. Alice, vote Charlie."

You: "Bob, lock in: who did you think was most likely to be killed N1 before flip? Also, confirm exact timestamps/order of your PMs. Charlie, give your full PoE and who you’ll vote if not Bob. I’m not voting without this."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is mafia. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Charlie with me."
Alice: "Bob, if you’re detective, why would mafia kill Diana instead of you? Charlie, claim your role. Bob, give details: why Charlie N1 and what result wording did you get?"

Charlie: "Bob is fake-claiming. Mafia killed Diana to frame me and keep a counterwagon alive. Alice, here are details: I’m vanilla town. Bob, what exact PM wording did you get, and why choose me over Diana N1?"

Charlie: "Bob’s story doesn’t add up: if he’s real, mafia obviously shoot the outed cop N1. Instead Diana dies. Alice, that’s TMI leakage. Force Bob to quote the exact result text and order of night results."

You: "Charlie is the mafioso. Result text: 'You investigated Charlie. Result: MAFIOSO.' I picked him N1 for scummy pregame vibes. Mafia killed Diana to avoid confirming me by shooting; they want doubt. Alice, vote Charlie."

Alice: "Bob, lock in: who did you think was most likely to be killed N1 before flip? Also, confirm exact timestamps/order of your PMs. Charlie, give your full PoE and who you’ll vote if not Bob. I’m not voting without this."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
